Class: OAuthPasswordGrantRequestAuthenticator

OAuthPasswordGrantRequestAuthenticator

new OAuthPasswordGrantRequestAuthenticator(application)

Use this authenticator to exchange a username and password for an access token and refresh token pair.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
application Application

The Stormpath Application that will be used for the authentication attempt.
Source:
  • oauth/password-grant.js, line 62
Example
var stormpath = require('stormpath');

var client = new stormpath.Client();

client.getApplication('myAppHref', function(err, application){
  var authenticator = new stormpath.OAuthPasswordGrantRequestAuthenticator(application);
});

Methods

authenticate(passwordGrantRequest, callback)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
passwordGrantRequest Object

An object with the password grant request properties.

Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
username String

The username or email address of the account that is attempting to authenticate.
password String

The password of the account that is attempting to authenticate.
accountStore String <optional>

The HREF of an account store to target during the authentication attempt.
callback function

Authentication result callback, see passwordGrantCallback.
Source:
  • oauth/password-grant.js, line 98
Example
authenticator.authenticate({
  username: 'email or username',
  password: 'the password'
}, function(err, oAuthPasswordGrantAuthenticationResult){
  // foo
});

Type Definitions

passwordGrantCallback(error, oAuthPasswordGrantAuthenticationResult)

This callback will be called with the authentication result, or an error.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
error Object | null

Error message from the Stormpath REST API.
oAuthPasswordGrantAuthenticationResult OAuthPasswordGrantAuthenticationResult

The authentication result, which contains the access token response.
Source:
  • oauth/password-grant.js, line 114
